content:
Hello! I'm Sam. I've been fiddling around with Rust for the past few months. It's been an absolute treat! What's drawn me towards Rust more than the language is the rich and vibrant community. :pray:
I was hoping to contribute to Rust and I tried looking for the label good-first-issue on Github and failed to find it. I'd be really grateful for any opportunity! I'm happy to contribute to documentation or anything else :smile:
See you around, folks! :wave:
I think you can look for E-easy, E-mentor or E-help-wanted.
